frameDefinitions: A Traveller leaves from or dismounts a Vehicle.
An Entity is at a particular stage of its development.
An Agent is described as pursuing an Activity, expending some effort.
This frame concerns an Evaluee being judged for its quality, i.e. how much it would probably be liked.

A Factor affects the outcome of an Undertaking, which  can be a goal-oriented activity or the maintenance of a desirable state, the work in a Field, or something portrayed as affecting an Interested_party.
This frame contains nouns denoting a rank or level within an established hierarchy.
frameExamples: The <t>Next Generation</t> Internet (NGI) Program has been successfully completed.
Sky, a Korean War veteran, was <t>active</t> in his opposition to Vietnam and continues to protest current combat in Iraq.
Temperature is the most <t>critical</t> factor in successful storage.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Traveller</fen> is the entity which disembarks from the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
The <fen>Vehicle</fen> is the means of conveyance that the <fen>Traveller</fen> disembarks from.
When the disembarking of the <fen>Vehicle</fen> takes place.
The location in which the <fen>Traveller</fen> disembarks from the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
The object that has reached a particular stage of its development.
The time at which the progress occurs.
This role identifies the name of the ongoing <fen>Activity</fen> in which an <fen>Agent</fen> engages.
The <fen>Agent</fen> engages in an ongoing <fen>Activity</fen>.
An entity acted upon by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
This role identifies the role filled by the <fen>Agent</fen> which is saliently associated with an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the  <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
The <fen>Evaluee</fen> is being judged for its quality.
This role marks expressions that denote a scalar property of the <fen>Evaluee</fen> with respect to which the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is judged.
<fen>Factor</fen> is used for the concrete or abstract entity whose importance is assessed.
The <fen>Undertaking</fen> is a process or state or field of activity in which the <fen>Interested_party</fen> has a stake.
<fen>Interested_party</fen> identifies the people who are affected by a particular <fen>Factor</fen>.
A <fen>Factor</fen> may be generally important to the people or the activities in a field of endeavour.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important.
The Rank itself, usually denoted by the noun.
An entity which holds a particular <fen>Rank</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>We</fex> got off at the wrong bus stop.
The victim stopped the tractor and dismounted <fex>from it</fex>.
<fex>Yesterday</fex>, we alighted onto this tiny hilly island, site of a Singaporean October festival.
We offer advice for very advanced <fex>learners of English</fex> on the different EFL/ESL exams.
He is always active <fex>demolishing the painted figures of men's faith</fex> and then is astonished to find the faith still there clothed in new figure.
<fex>He</fex> was active for six decades as a painter, graphic designer and theorist of art and design.
<fex>As many as 324 companies' stocks</fex> were active across the board.
Jacques Fuller has been active <fex>as a sculptor</fex> in Bloemfontein for almost two decades.
Commercial selling was active <fex>yesterday</fex> but a lack of interest allowed the market to push sharply higher into the mid-session.
He is retired from Whirlpool Corp. in Clyde and is active <fex>at the YMCA</fex>.
The Beaujolais Nouveau is dazzling <fex>in freshness</fex>.
<fex>Being sure they are buying fresh food</fex> is important to most people.
Temperature is the most critical factor <fex>in successful storage</fex>.
Being sure they are buying fresh food is important <fex>to most people</fex>.
A successful GATT round is important <fex>for the world economy</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Pages from Mother's Prayer Book
Ashes to the Rainbow: The Art of Alice Lok Cahana
From Ashes to the Rainbow: A Tribute to Raoul Wallenberg
the Pages From My Mother's Prayer Book
